On Saturday, Pope Benedict XVI said priests had an important pastoral job to discern whether would-be spouses are prepared and able to enter into a valid marriage. The church and society at large place too much importance on the good of marriage and the family founded on it to not make a profound commitment to it pastorally, Pope Benedict XVI said. We respectfully submit that Google CEO Eric Schmidt should be asked to testify under oath so that the American public learns the truth about Wi-Spy. In response, Google said the letter was "just the latest in a long list of press stunts from an organization that admits to working closely with our competitors." Last September, Eric Schmidt was named by David Cameron

, taking over day-to-day operations as CEO as of April 4. The company said the goal of the surprise executive change, the biggest at the Web firm since Eric Schmidt joined it as CEO in 2001, is to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, in particular new products, one of his key passions, as he said on a conference calls. This effort to rewrite history is shameful. Donald Rumsfeld 's office is not commenting on the book until its Tuesday release date.
